column1: 1. Excludes software embedded, or bundled, in computers and other equipment.
2. Research and development (R&D) asset types are defined by the type of funder.
3. Includes research and development expenditures for software.
4. Includes R&D investment by private universities and colleges. R&D investment by public universities and colleges is included in state and local government investment.
